ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Computed tomography (CT) scan of the abdomen; drawing shows the patient on a table that slides through the CT machine, which takes x-ray pictures of the inside of the body.

Captions.MediaCaption: Computed tomography (CT) scan of the abdomen. The patient lies on a table that slides through the CT machine, which takes x-ray pictures of the inside of the body.

MediaContent.Comment: Deleted Spn caption and content description
2008-06-17; Made t in tomography and s in scan lower case, added "drawing" and "the" in cont desc and "Computed tomography (CT)" and "the" in cap; dlb.
